title: Republic Day 2026: Delhi police turn to AI smart glasses, facial recognition to track suspects
description: Delhi Police enhances Republic Day 2026 security with AI smart glasses & facial recognition for real-time threat detection. Learn how technology is securing the capital.

title: Anthropic rewrites Claude’s guiding principles—and reckons with the possibility of AI consciousness
description: Anthropic is overhauling a foundational document that shapes how its popular Claude AI model behaves. The AI lab is moving away from training the model to follow a simple list of principles—such as choosing the response that is least racist or sexist—to instead teach the AI why it should act in...

title: The inventor of the 'suicide pod' says AI should decide who can end their life
description: The inventor of the controversial Sarco suicide pod says AI software could one day replace psychiatrists in assessing mental capacity for those seeking assisted dying.
